summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling previous relevant resolutions,
Welcoming the Secretary-General's report of 10 March 2000,
Acting under Chapter VII of the Charter,
1. Decides to use up to $600 million from the escrow account to meet reasonable expenses, excluding those payable in Iraq, related to contracts approved under resolution 1175 (1998);
2. Expresses willingness to consider expeditiously other recommendations in the Secretary-General's report and provisions of section C of resolution 1284 (1999);
3. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
